abstract: Though corruption is pervasive in China, very few executives at foreign multinationals have been detained or arrested. That may be changing.
snippet: Though corruption is pervasive in China, very few executives at foreign multinationals have been detained or arrested. That may be changing.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI  Police here have detained a former employee of a Coca-Cola bottling plant, whom they accused of corruption and bribery.

headline.main: In Shanghai, Police Detain Former Worker at Coca-Cola
headline.print_headline: In Shanghai, Police Detain Former Worker at Coca-Cola
